name: Introduction to Linguistics
description: An introduction to the study of language with a focus on the structure of language, language acquisition, and language change.

name: Introduction to Sociolinguistics
description: A study of language as a social phenomenon, with a focus on language variation, language attitudes, and language change.

name: Methods of Sociolinguistic Research
description: An introduction to the methods used to conduct sociolinguistic research, with a focus on quantitative and qualitative methods.

name: Sociolinguistic Fieldwork
description: A course exploring the theoretical and practical aspects of sociolinguistic fieldwork, with a focus on data collection, analysis, and interpretation.

name: Sociolinguistic Theory
description: An exploration of the theories and models used to explain sociolinguistic phenomena, with a focus on language variation and language change.
